The video clip was shared on Facebook an: 2. The Indonesian-language caption of the post translates to English as "In Russia they buried 200 bodies altogether."
The video includes comments in Russian: such as "I think it's people" and "Look, there is the head, the legs" which indicate that the bodies in the video are human.
A reverse image search found a similar v: which clarified that the video was actually a scene from a music video shoot at a hospital in Moscow.
